comment:
Aged 5 years in bourbon casks with a 2 year finish in PX casks. Great stuff, can hang in with many high end Asian whiskies.


Nose: Figs, Chocolate, Toffee, Banana, Coffee, Peanut Butter, Pineapple, Guava, Pepper, Hazelnuts, Orange, Apricot, Raisins,

Palate: Guava, Mango, Passionfruit, Dates, Raisins, Dark Chocolate, Citrus, Toffee, Orange Peel, Pepper

Finish: Orange, Raisin, Chocolate, Pepper, Vanilla
